content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Maria. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
700 Euro per month.

Maria Mamani: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Excellent, Maria! I am happy to agree to the rental price of 700 Euro per month for the 25 square meter apartment. Let's move forward with the rental process. Do you have any additional questions or concerns?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you for your time and I will see you again at the move-in date.

Maria Mamani: Thank you, I look forward to moving in to my new apartment.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Maria. I am glad to have you as a tenant. Please let me know if you need any assistance with the move-in process. I look forward to welcoming you to your new home.
name: Heinrich Heine
